parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   30 (default)
*   50
*   100

parameters.name: QueryDurationMs
parameters.description: The execution duration of slow SQL queries. Minimum value: **1000**. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss format. The time must be in UTC.
